definition: round yellow dirt mount (in the Northwest of China)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

mortise (slot cut into wood to receive a tenon)/4th earthly branch: 5-7 a.m., 2nd solar month (6th March-4th April), year of the Rabbit/ancient Chinese compass point: 90° (east)/variant of 鉚|铆[mao3]/to exert one's strength

sentences.english: In the setting sun and on top of the mound a boy was enjoying his feast.
sentences.chinese: 夕陽下，山峁上，這是一個孩子的盛宴。

definition: plateau, esp. Loess Plateau of northwest China 黃土高原|黄土高原[Huang2 tu3 Gao1 yuan2]
abbr. for 峴首山|岘首山[Xian4 shou3 shan1]/Mt Xianshou in Hubei/steep hill/used in place names
fertile arable soil of loess plateau
Qingjian County in Yulin 榆林[Yu2 lin2], Shaanxi
Potou district of Zhanjiang city 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 shi4], Guangdong
earth embankment used to hold back or retain water/dike around a paddy field
